title: Chainverge [DAO]
author: Chainverge [DAO]
created_time: September 26, 2023, 10:40:20 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 11:02:57 PM by Chainverge [DAO]
content: Welcome to Chainverge, a groundbreaking project that aims to reshape the decentralized landscape by integrating DeFi, gaming, and a suite of innovative products. Built on the Ethereum Chain, Chainverge is in its development phase, with a roadmap set to unfold in the coming months.Token Details:    Token Name: Chainverge    Token Ticker: CVE    Total Supply: 100,000,000 CVE    Blockchain: Ethereum    Transaction Fee: 1% (0.5% Burn, 0.5% Coinsafe)Burn Mechanism:    Burn: 0.5% of every transaction is permanently burned, ensuring a decreasing supply and fostering potential price appreciation.    Coinsafe: The remaining 0.5% is directed to the Chainverge Coinsafe, a community-driven fund that propels various ecosystem initiatives.DAO Governance:Chainverge operates under a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) model. This ensures that the community is at the heart of every decision, from product enhancements to financial strategies. Token holders can submit and vote on proposals, with voting power being proportional to their CVE holdings.Swap and Bridge Aggregator:    Swap Aggregator: Chainverge's Swap Aggregator meticulously scans prices across decentralized exchanges, ensuring users receive the best rates. It supports over 30,000 tokens and charges a nominal 0.3% fee, which is directly allocated to the Chainverge Coinsafe.    Bridge Aggregator: This tool facilitates seamless cross-chain transactions by identifying the best routes across networks like Ethereum, Binance, Polygon, Avalanche, Solana, and more.Products & Features:    Web3 Crypto Card: Chainverge introduces the first-ever WEB3-based crypto card, allowing direct top-ups via MetaMask or TrustWallet. Users enjoy a 2% cashback and a plethora of other features.    Vergebot: This state-of-the-art bot monitors mempool transactions, capitalizing on microtransactions to generate swift profits.    NFT Ecosystem: Chainverge's NFTs serve dual purposes - in-game items and staking boosters. These NFTs can enhance in-game player stats and augment staking rewards.Open Source & Decentralization:Chainverge is committed to transparency and decentralization. Our code is open-source, ensuring that the community can review, audit, and contribute to our project. This level of transparency fosters trust and collaboration.Airdrop Campaign:Join the Chainverge Airdrop Campaign on Questn.com and Bitcointalk! Engage in tasks, from social media activities to sharing our mission, and earn CVE tokens. Don't miss this opportunity to be an early Chainverge adopter.Development Timeline:Our dedicated team is working around the clock to bring Chainverge to life. While the project is currently under development, we're on track to unveil our full suite of products and features in the upcoming months.Security & Trust:Chainverge prioritizes security. All our smart contracts undergo rigorous audits, ensuring the utmost security for our community.Stay Connected:    Website: Coming Soon...    Twitter: @Chainverge    Telegram: https://t.me/+wtW8-GVg0T5hYWUyChainverge is more than a project; it's a revolution. We're setting the stage for a decentralized future where finance, gaming, and innovation converge. Join us on this transformative journey.For more Details check our Documentation: https://chainverge.gitbook.io/chainverge/
